faq.q1: How do I activate my eSIM?
faq.a1: After purchase, you'll receive a QR code via email. Simply scan it with your phone's camera, and your eSIM will be activated instantly. Make sure your device supports eSIM functionality.
faq.q2: Can I use the SIM card immediately upon arrival?
faq.a2: Yes! Physical SIM cards can be picked up at our stores in Myeongdong or Hongdae, and activated immediately. eSIMs can be activated before you even land in Korea.
faq.q3: What happens if I run out of data?
faq.a3: Don't worry! You can top up your data plan anytime through our website or by visiting one of our stores. We also offer unlimited data plans for heavy users.
faq.a4: Most modern smartphones support eSIM, including iPhone XS and newer, Samsung Galaxy S20 and newer, and Google Pixel 3 and newer. Check your device settings or contact us if you're unsure.
faq.q5: Do I need to unlock my phone?
faq.a5: For physical SIM cards, your phone must be unlocked. For eSIM, your device needs to be eSIM-capable and not carrier-locked for eSIM functionality. Most phones purchased outright are unlocked.
faq.q6: What network coverage can I expect?
faq.a6: We use Korea's top carriers - SK Telecom, KT, and LG U+ - providing excellent LTE/5G coverage across the entire country, including rural areas and subway systems.

inStorePickupPolicy.metaDescription: Learn about 82Mobile's in-store SIM card pickup process and reservation deposit policy.
inStorePickupPolicy.title: In-Store Pickup Policy
inStorePickupPolicy.section1Content: 82Mobile operates a reservation-based model for SIM card purchases. Customers pay a ₩5,000 reservation deposit online, then visit our physical store to complete the purchase, pay the remaining balance, and have their SIM card activated on the spot. This is a physical product sale — the SIM card is a tangible item handed to the customer at the store.
inStorePickupPolicy.section2Step1: Choose your desired SIM card plan on our website and pay the ₩5,000 reservation deposit online via credit card.
inStorePickupPolicy.section2Step2: Receive a confirmation email with your reservation details and a ₩5,000 discount coupon to use at the store.
inStorePickupPolicy.section2Step3: Visit our store within 30 days, pay the remaining balance (full plan price minus ₩5,000 deposit), and receive your SIM card with instant activation.
inStorePickupPolicy.section3Address: 42 Wolgok-ro 10-gil, Seongbuk-gu, Seoul, Bldg 4, Unit 201 (Jongam-dong, Jongam Hillstate)
inStorePickupPolicy.section4Item1: The ₩5,000 online payment is a reservation deposit and will be deducted from the total plan price at the store.
inStorePickupPolicy.section4Item2: Reservations are valid for 30 days from the date of online payment. After 30 days, the deposit is automatically refunded.
inStorePickupPolicy.section4Item3: Please bring a valid ID (passport for international customers) when visiting the store for SIM card activation.
inStorePickupPolicy.section5Content: If you have any questions about the in-store pickup process or need to modify your reservation, please contact us:

refundPolicy.metaDescription: Learn about 82Mobile's refund and cancellation policy.
refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.section1Content: At 82Mobile, we want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. This Refund Policy outlines the conditions under which refunds are available for our ₩5,000 online reservation deposit and in-store purchases.
refundPolicy.section2Intro: The ₩5,000 online reservation deposit is refundable under the following conditions:
refundPolicy.section2Eligible1: Cancellation before store visit: Full ₩5,000 refund if you cancel before visiting the store
refundPolicy.section2Eligible2: No-show within 30 days: Full ₩5,000 refund if you do not visit the store within 30 days of reservation
refundPolicy.section2Eligible3: Product unavailable: Full ₩5,000 refund if the reserved product is out of stock at the store
refundPolicy.section2NotEligible1: After SIM activation: No refund once the SIM card has been activated at the store
refundPolicy.section2NotEligible2: After store payment: No deposit refund once the remaining balance has been paid at the store
refundPolicy.section2NotEligible3: Past 30 days: Reservation deposit refund requests must be made within 30 days of payment
refundPolicy.section3Step1: Contact our customer support via email (adamwoohaha@naver.com) or phone (+82 10-6424-6530)
refundPolicy.section3Step2: Provide your reservation number and reason for refund
refundPolicy.section3Step3: Return the SIM card (if applicable) in original, unused condition
refundPolicy.section3Step4: Refund will be processed to your original payment method
refundPolicy.section4Content: Refunds are typically processed within 5-7 business days after approval. Please allow an additional 3-5 business days for the refund to appear in your account, depending on your bank or payment provider.
refundPolicy.section5Content: For the remaining balance paid at the store: Full refund is available if the SIM card has not been activated. Once activated, refunds are not available as the telecommunications service has been initiated. Partial refunds may be granted at our discretion for service disruptions.
refundPolicy.section6Content: To request a refund or if you have questions about our Refund Policy, please contact:
